video_prompt: Submerged blonde mermaid, hair and tail flowing gracefully amidst rising air bubbles. Eyelids flutter. Hands perform a slow, balletic motion. Light shimmers and shifts on scales. Water subtly darkens towards the moving seabed.
image_prompt: Enchanting full-body vertical shot of a serene blonde mermaid, eyes closed, gazing left, submerged underwater. Her blonde hair, adorned with light-blue flowers, flows around her. She wears a silver-scaled bikini top and an intricately designed light pink and blue shimmering tail. Her hands are elegantly poised, amidst a multitude of glistening air bubbles. Light from above illuminates her, creating a magical atmosphere in the blue-green water, with a faintly visible seabed. **Remove the signature "c29" from the final image.**
refined_video_prompt: Blonde hair flows gracefully, alongside a gently swaying tail. Eyelids flutter, and hands perform a slow, balletic motion. Light shimmers and shifts across scales. Air bubbles continuously rise. The seabed subtly moves, causing water to darken.
